segments.text: Excuse me . I wonder if you could help me . I'm looking for the Oriental Pearl Theater .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Boy , you are lost . It's across town .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ! What bad luck ! How can I get to the Theater ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can take a No . 12 bus here and then transfer to a No . 23 bus to get there .
segments.speaker: S2
